"Pinkalicious" Author Visit at Pequot Library
Wed Jun 18, 2025
4:00pm to 5:00pm ET
Age: 3-8
Price: Free
Location:
Pequot Library
Pequot Library is welcoming Pinkalicious author Victoria Kann back to read "Treasuretastic" as part of their Treasures and Collections Summer Programs. A book signing will follow, with Pinkalicious books available for purchase.
Afterward, kids can head outside for a nature-themed treasure hunt, searching for natural treasures like leaves, rocks, and flowersâ€”just like Pinkalicious and Peter in the story.
** Activity dates/times are subject to change. Please click through to the activity website to verify.
